author: Kikkoman
title: Chicken-pepper stir-fry with pineapple & chilli
ingredients: 300 g chicken breast (or boneless chicken thighs)
80 ml Kikkoman Naturally Brewed Soy Sauce
50 ml Kikkoman Naturally Brewed Soy Sauce
300 g chicken breast (or boneless chicken thighs)
80 ml Kikkoman Naturally Brewed Soy Sauce
50 ml Kikkoman Naturally Brewed Soy Sauce

instructions_list: Cut the chicken into cubes. Add the Kikkoman Soy Sauce, sugar, ground cumin, grated ginger and lime juice. Mix well and marinate for about 30 minutes.

Thinly slice the onion. Finely chop or grate the ginger. Chop the chilli pepper. Cut the pineapple into large cubes, the peppers into cubes or diamonds, and the carrot into half-moons. Chop the coriander.

Heat a little cooking oil in the pan. Add the chicken and cook over a high heat until it starts to brown. Add the onion, carrot, ginger, pineapple and chilli pepper and stir-fry for about 1 minute. Add the brown sugar and wait for it to caramelise. Add the peppers and mix everything together. Stir-fry for 1-2 minutes. Finally, add the Kikkoman Soy Sauce and cook until the excess liquid evaporates.
Serve with the fresh coriander and lime.
category: Main courses, Stir fry, Spring, Autumn, Winter, Asian, Poultry, Vegetables
description: Enjoy the perfect balance of sweet and sour with this quick and easy pineapple chicken stir-fry, enhanced with a spicy dash of chilli.
